roleset.name: incongruous between what is expected and what is

example.name: both args
example.text: The story was ironic to the real world .

example.name: with ADV
example.text: This was ironic to the millions of Venezuelan viewers who saw their president describing the attack with his hands heavily bandaged in white gauze ; just a few days earlier , in a television interview , Betancourt angrily denied any claims to corruption , affirming that should he ever illegally take any public funds , his hands should burn in punishment .

propbank.arg: to the millions of Venezuelan viewers who saw their president describing the attack with his hands heavily bandaged in white gauze

example.name: empty it
example.text: It 's ironic that some Scots take issue with the United Kingdom while ignoring that Scotland was created in much the same fashion .

propbank.arg: that some Scots take issue with the United Kingdom while ignoring that Scotland was created in much the same fashion

roleset.note: IRONIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, WordNet. (from ironic.01-j)
